title: NON-VERBAL COMMUNICATION AND PERSONALITIES / DR. MARCO PARET
description:
Dr. Paret will explain more about non-verbal communication and personalities. Mesmerism and Hypnosis can be truly understood only if we understand non-verbal communication. Communication is much more than the meaning of words and the literal information of the messages conveyed. If a therapist knows the secrets of non-verbal communication he can get results much faster. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
